Name: Vive le Roi 2
About the game: « Vive le Roi 2 » is a puzzle platform game with levels taking place during the French Revolution. Revolutionaries are about to guillotine Louis XVI, leaving the bourgeoisie free to take over and enrich themselves by snapping up the assets of the clergy and the nobility. You are the last hope for the people of France to prevent the King's execution and alter the country's destiny. The game features 36 levels and many puzzles to solve during the course of the adventure. Stealthy trick guards by opening gates, moving objects and much more...
